title: Bloomberg Markets: Wittner Discusses Oil Entering Bear Market
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Wittner Discusses Oil Entering Bear Market
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Wittner Global Head of Oil Research Societe Generale Discussing his thoughts on the oil market, he sees oil possibily hitting $40 a barrel.
